name: Netwalker
description:
A Cyberpunk Real-Time/Turn-Based Strategy Game Hybrid!

The Year is 2078. The Corporation dictates Limit City. It's time you stopped them.

- Story cutscenes

- 5 Unique Bosses (inc. Secret Boss)

- 2 Unlockable Abilities

- Customisable 'Deck'

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

credits:

Thrifty Elixir is a two-man team.

Programming and some of the (lesser) art by me (MrSprinkles) and the awesome character art by Tom.

music by White Bat Audio.
